org.osmdroid.tileprovider

Class MapTileProviderBasic

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.osmdroid.tileprovider.MapTileProviderBase
      • org.osmdroid.tileprovider.MapTileProviderArray
        • org.osmdroid.tileprovider.MapTileProviderBasic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMapTileProviderCallback

    public class MapTileProviderBasic
extends MapTileProviderArray
implements IMapTileProviderCallback
    This top-level tile provider implements a basic tile request chain which includes a MapTileFilesystemProvider (a file-system cache), a MapTileFileArchiveProvider (archive provider), and a MapTileDownloader (downloads map tiles via tile source). Behavior change since osmdroid 5.3: If the device is less than API 10, the file system based cache and writer are used otherwise, the sqlite based
    See Also:
    TileWriter, SqlTileWriter, MapTileFilesystemProvider, MapTileSqlCacheProvider
